thread.section_title: Easy Signs Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Easy Signs | easysigns.com.au
thread.title: Chris Gray
thread.title_full: Easy Signs reviewed by Chris Gray

author: Chris Gray
title: Chris Gray
text: I ordered two pull-up signs via the website. Follow-up and proofs were quick and precise (e.g. graphic designers double-checked whether I was happy that a couple of photos were a bit low res; the issue was slight and I was happy to proceed, but it was a good example of due diligence), and delivery was within 24 hours (which was part of the deal). Final product looks and works great, too.
